title: Regarding Board Level 7 Discussion Requirement
body: When viewing my board profile it displays that I am level 30 however, the requirement for posting a topic or comment is 7. How does this system work? Apologize if this is an obvious question.

replies.body: Sounds like it was just a syncing issue on the boards.  Your profile looks to be showing as 30 now, so let me know if this is still an issue!
